summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the solicitation of rides, divided streets and passing, amending Sections 21.14.300, 21.20.040, and 21.20.320 of the Traffic Code (Ordinance 91910), adding new sections thereto designated Sections 21.14.305, 21.14.310 and 21.14.330, and repealing Section 21.26.460.
